attributes.action: Support Israel in its fight against terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK government should support Israel in its fight against terrorism by preventing Egypt, Syria and Iran from smuggling weapons into Gaza, and helping Palestinians to rebuild their land by removing corruption, import taxes that land into Hamas private pockets instead on being spent on schools and hospitals, restoration of human rights suppressed by Hamas authorities and by stopping Hamas killing Palestinians and Israelis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
